structure.unit: RIGHTS OF ACTION AND SURVIVAL OF ACTIONS

law.text: KRS 411.500 to 411.570 shall not be construed as repealing any of the statutes or common law of the Commonwealth relating to nuisance, nor shall be construed to abridge any other rights or remedies available for personal or property damage, but shall be held and construed as ancillary and supplemental thereto.
law.history: Created 1991 (1st Extra. Sess.)Ky. Acts ch. 11, sec. 8, effective May 24, 1991.
